Read file and show row count and column names:
```{r} 
data <- read.csv("vehicles.csv") 
nrow(data)
colnames(data)
```

clean duplicate ID and display removed row count from original data
```{r clean id}
d_c_id = data[!duplicated(data$id),]
nrow(data[duplicated(data$id),]) 
```

remove missing price (na / 0) and display removed row count from original data
```{r clean price}
d_c_price = data[!is.na(data$price) & data$price != 0,]
nrow(data[data$price == 0,]) 
```

```{r all cleaned}
clean = data[!duplicated(data$id) & !is.na(data$price) & data$price != 0,]
clean
```
